extension.name: System - eMundus Waiting Room
extension.author: eMundus
extension.description: Provides control on max active users sessions

field.name: force_redirect
field.label: Force redirect
field.description: Force the redirection to the waiting page URL. If no, then display a message.

field.name: redirection_url
field.label: Waiting page URL
field.description: The URL for the waiting room page, you can put a JText tag here for SEF URls that are translated.

field.name: message_displayed
field.label: Message displayed if Force redirection is set to No
field.description: Display a warning message if max session is reached.

field.name: max_sessions
field.label: Max activated sessions
field.description: The number of max activated sessions allowed.
